author: GameSpot
description:
Here are two methods that, we think, are faster than the run.

Method 1 is the jump cancel dash. Press jump, and quickly dash slightly off the ground. When you land, jump again and air dash. 

Method 2 is dash and air dash.
Dash and then hold the dash button to run. While running, jump and air dash, and continue to hold the dash button in order to run upon landing.
title: How to Move Fast in Hollow Knight: Silksong

author: GameSpot
description:
If you’ve been keeping an eye on Battlefield 6 you’ll know there has been one major piece of the large-scale first-person shooter puzzle missing: Battle Royale. Well, EA has finally revealed what players can expect from a BF6 battle royale mode. While we don't have much footage outside of a very short teaser, we do have a bunch of details, including info on classes, number of players, the dangerous ring, and how to sign up to eventually partake in playing the mode.

#battlefield6  #battleroyalegame  #bf6  #gamespot
title: Battlefield 6 Battle Royale Everything We Know So Far

author: GameSpot
description:
We wanted to give you some useful tips before heading into your grand adventure in Borderlands 4. Get some quick tips on gearing, the change in economy and currency, the open world and quest difficulties.

title: Borderlands 4 | Things I Wish I Knew Before Playing

author: GameSpot
description:
Check out the opening cinematic for Borderlands 4 that showcases all 4 vault hunters including Rafa the Exo-soldier, Harlowe the Gravitar, Amon the Forgeknight and Vex the Siren. Who will you be playing when Borderlands 4 releases? Borderlands 4 will be available on PC at 9am PT starting 9/11 and on consoles later that night at 9PM PT.

#gaming #borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 Opening Cinematic

author: GameSpot
description:
We got to check out the Digimon Story: Time Stranger gameplay on PC via Steam and we attempt to digivolve into digital champions. We use primarily DemiDevimon as our first Digimon but gain new friends and digivolve new Digimon along the way. Get a glimpse of the gameplay for the upcoming release of the full game coming October 2nd.

#digimon  #gaming
title: 50 Minutes of Digimon Story: Time Stranger Gameplay Demo
